price: 为主道而阵亡的人，你绝不要认为他们是死的，其实，他们是活着的，他们在安拉那里享受给养。
arabic: وَلَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ قُتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَمۡوَٰتَۢاۚ بَلۡ أَحۡيَآءٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ يُرۡزَقُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: walā taḥsabanna alladhīna qutilū fī sabīli al-lahi amwātan bal aḥyāon ʿinda rabbihim yur'zaqūna
